items.name: ActiveAtDistance.RangeType
items.summary: Whether the object is active or inactive when the target is in range.

items.name: ActiveInRange
items.summary: The object is active when the target is in range.

items.name: InactiveInRange
items.summary: The object is inactive when the target is in range.

items.name: ActiveAtDistance
items.summary:
Sets another game object to be active or inactive based on the distance
to a target transform.

items.name: rangeType
items.summary: Whether the object is active or inactive when the target is in range.

items.name: target
items.summary: The target transform to measure distance from.

items.name: activatingObject
items.summary: The object to activate or deactivate.

items.name: minDistance
items.summary: The minimum distance for the object to be active.

items.name: maxDistance
items.summary: The maximum distance for the object to be active.

items.name: withinRange
items.summary: Whether object is currently within the range.

items.name: AxisConstraint
items.summary: Flags to constrain an axis.

items.name: None
items.summary: No constraint.

items.name: X
items.summary: Constrain the X axis.

items.name: Y
items.summary: Constrain the Y axis.

items.name: Z
items.summary: Constrain the Z axis.

items.summary: Extension methods for <xref href="Zigurous.Utility.AxisConstraint" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

syntax.content: public static bool Contains(this AxisConstraint constraints, AxisConstraint axis)

parameters.description: The constraints to check.
The axis to check for.

return.description: True if the constraints contain the specified axis.

items.name: BillboardRotation
items.summary: Rotates an object so it is always facing the camera.

items.name: constraints
items.summary: Restricts rotation around the specified axes.

items.name: lookTransform
items.summary: The object to look at.

items.name: worldUp
items.summary: The world upwards vector.

items.name: ConditionalAttribute.PropertyDrawer
items.summary: A type of property drawer used to draw the field.

items.name: Default
items.summary: Draws the field as a normal property based on its type.

items.name: Slider
items.summary: Draws the field with a slider.

items.name: ConditionalAttribute
items.summary: An attribute that shows or hides a field in the editor based on a condition.

items.name: propertyDrawer
items.summary: The type of property drawer to use to draw the field.

items.name: conditionalField
items.summary: The field being used to determine if the condition is met.

items.name: show
items.summary: Whether to show or hide the field when the condition is met.

items.name: enumValue
items.summary:
The enum value to use to determine if the condition is met (only
applicable if the conditional field is an enum).

items.name: enumFlags
items.summary:
Whether the enum should be treated as a bit field (only applicable
if the conditional field is an enum).

items.name: sliderMinValue
items.summary:
The minimum value of the slider (only applicable for Slider property
drawers).

items.name: sliderMaxValue
items.summary:
The maximum value of the slider (only applicable for Slider property
drawers).

items.name: ConditionalHideAttribute
items.summary: An attribute that hides a field in the editor based on a condition.

items.name: ConditionalHideAttribute(String)
items.summary: Hides the field when the conditional field is true.

parameters.description: The name of the conditional field.

items.name: ConditionalHideAttribute(String, Single, Single)
items.summary:
Hides the field when the conditional field is true.
Draws the field as a slider.

syntax.content: public ConditionalHideAttribute(string conditionalField, float sliderMinValue, float sliderMaxValue)

parameters.description: The name of the conditional field.
The minimum value of the slider.
The maximum value of the slider.

items.name: ConditionalHideAttribute(String, Int32, Boolean)
items.summary:
Hides the field when the conditional field is set to the specified
enum value (this assumes the conditional field is an enum).

syntax.content: public ConditionalHideAttribute(string conditionalField, int enumValue, bool flags = false)

parameters.description: The name of the conditional field.
The enum value to check for.
Treats the enum as a bit field.

items.name: ConditionalShowAttribute
items.summary: An attribute that shows a field in the editor based on a condition.

items.name: ConditionalShowAttribute(String)
items.summary: Hides the field when the conditional field is true.

parameters.description: The name of the conditional field.

items.name: ConditionalShowAttribute(String, Single, Single)
items.summary:
Hides the field when the conditional field is true.
Draws the field as a slider.

syntax.content: public ConditionalShowAttribute(string conditionalField, float sliderMinValue, float sliderMaxValue)

parameters.description: The name of the conditional field.
The minimum value of the slider.
The maximum value of the slider.

items.name: ConditionalShowAttribute(String, Int32, Boolean)
items.summary:
Hides the field when the conditional field is set to the specified
enum value (this assumes the conditional field is an enum).

syntax.content: public ConditionalShowAttribute(string conditionalField, int enumValue, bool flags = false)

parameters.description: The name of the conditional field.
The enum value to check for.
Treats the enum as a bit field.

items.name: GetRequiredComponent<T>(GameObject)
items.summary:
Gets the specified component from the game object. If the component
does not exist then it will be added to the game object.

syntax.content:
public static T GetRequiredComponent<T>(this GameObject gameObject)
    where T : Component

parameters.description: The game object to get the component from.

return.description: The component.

typeParameters.description: The type of component to get.

items.summary: Checks if the game object has a component of the specified type.

parameters.description: The game object to check for the component.

return.description: True if the component exists, false otherwise.

typeParameters.description: The type of component to check for.

return.description: True if the component exists, false otherwise.

Checks if the game object has a component of the specified type on
itself or on any of its children using depth first search.

parameters.description: The game object to check for the component.
Includes inactive game objects.

return.description: True if the component exists, false otherwise.

typeParameters.description: The type of component to check for.

items.summary:
Checks if the game object has a component of the specified type on
itself or on any of its children using depth first search.

syntax.content: public static bool HasComponentInChildren(this GameObject gameObject, Type component, bool includeInactive = false)

parameters.description: The game object to check for the component.
The type of component to check for.
Includes inactive game objects.

return.description: True if the component exists, false otherwise.

Checks if the game object has a component of the specified type on
itself or any of its parents.

parameters.description: The game object to check for the component.

return.description: True if the component exists, false otherwise.

typeParameters.description: The type of component to check for.

items.name: HasComponentInParent(GameObject, Type)
items.summary:
Checks if the game object has a component of the specified type on
itself or any of its parents.

syntax.content: public static bool HasComponentInParent(this GameObject gameObject, Type component)

parameters.description: The game object to check for the component.
The type of component to check for.

return.description: True if the component exists, false otherwise.

items.name: CopyComponent_UNSAFE<T>(GameObject, T)
items.summary:
Copies a component from one game object to another with the exact
same values.

syntax.content:
public static T CopyComponent_UNSAFE<T>(this GameObject gameObject, T component)
    where T : Component

parameters.description: The game object to copy the component to.
The component to copy.

return.description: The copied component.

typeParameters.description: The type of component to copy.

items.name: InputRotation
items.summary: Rotates the transform based on input.

items.name: speed
items.summary: The speed at which the transform rotates.

items.name: space
items.summary: The coordinate space to rotate the transform in.

items.name: LoadSceneDelayed
items.summary: Loads a scene after a set delay.

items.name: mode
items.summary: The mode to use for loading the scene.

items.name: scene
items.summary: The name of the scene to load.

items.name: delay
items.summary: The delay in seconds before loading the scene.

items.name: loadOnStart
items.summary: Loads the scene when the script starts.

items.name: async
items.summary: Loads the scene asyncronously in the background.

items.name: Start()
items.summary: A Unity lifecycle method called the first frame the behavior is enabled.

items.name: Load()
items.summary: Loads the scene using the settings provided in the script.

items.name: LoadImmediate()
items.summary:
Loads the scene using the settings provided in the script while
ignoring the delay.

items.name: LoadScene()
items.summary: Loads the scene synchronously.

items.name: LoadSceneAsync()
items.summary: Loads the scene asynchronously.

return.description: The async operation.

items.name: LockPosition
items.summary: Locks the position of the transform to a specified value.

items.name: constraints
items.summary: The position axes to lock.

items.name: lockToStartPosition
items.summary: Sets the locked position to the transform's position at startup.

items.name: lockedPosition
items.summary: The locked position of the transform.

items.name: LockRotation
items.summary: Locks the rotation of the transform to a specified value.

items.name: constraints
items.summary: The rotation axes to lock.

items.name: lockToStartRotation
items.summary: Sets the locked rotation to the transform's rotation at startup.

items.name: lockedRotation
items.summary: The locked rotation of the transform.

items.name: LockScale
items.summary: Locks the scale of the transform to a specified value.

items.name: constraints
items.summary: The scale axes to lock.

items.name: lockToStartScale
items.summary: Sets the locked scale to the transform's scale at startup.

items.name: lockedScale
items.summary: The locked scale of the transform.

items.name: LookAtMouse
items.summary: Rotates the transform to look at the mouse.

items.name: screenCamera
items.summary: The camera used to convert positions from world space to screen space.

items.name: MatchPosition
items.summary: Matches the position of the transform to another.

items.name: constraints
items.summary: The position axes to match.

items.name: matchedTransform
items.summary: The target transform to match the position to.

items.name: MatchRotation
items.summary: Matches the rotation of the transform to another.

items.name: constraints
items.summary: The rotation axes to match.

items.name: matchedTransform
items.summary: The target transform to match the rotation to.

items.name: MatchScale
items.summary: Matches the scale of the transform to another.

items.name: constraints
items.summary: The scale axes to match.

items.name: matchedTransform
items.summary: The target transform to match the scale to.

items.name: MatchTransform
items.summary: Matches the transform values to another.

items.name: constraints
items.summary: The transform properties to match.

items.name: matchedTransform
items.summary: The target transform to match.

items.name: MonoBehaviorExtensions
items.summary: Extension methods for Unity MonoBehaviors.

items.name: Wait(MonoBehaviour, Single, Action)
items.summary: Executes an action after a delay.

syntax.content: public static Coroutine Wait(this MonoBehaviour behavior, float delay, Action action)

parameters.description: The behavior to execute the action on.
The delay in seconds.
The action to execute.

return.description: The coroutine.

items.name: Wait<T>(MonoBehaviour, Single, Action<T>, T)
items.summary: Executes an action after a delay.

syntax.content: public static Coroutine Wait<T>(this MonoBehaviour behavior, float delay, Action<T> action, T obj)

parameters.description: The behavior to execute the action on.
The delay in seconds.
The action to execute.
The object to pass to the action.

return.description: The coroutine.

typeParameters.description: The type of the object to pass to the action.

items.name: Repeat(MonoBehaviour, Action, Single)
items.summary: Repeats an action at a set interval.

syntax.content: public static Coroutine Repeat(this MonoBehaviour behavior, Action action, float interval)

parameters.description: The behavior to execute the action on.
The action to execute.
The interval to repeat the action, in seconds.

return.description: The coroutine.

items.name: RepeatWhile(MonoBehaviour, Func<Boolean>, Action, Single)
items.summary: Repeats an action at a set interval while a condition is true.

syntax.content: public static Coroutine RepeatWhile(this MonoBehaviour behaviour, Func<bool> condition, Action action, float interval)

parameters.description: The condition to check.
The action to execute.
The interval to repeat the action, in seconds.

return.description: The coroutine.

items.name: RepeatUntil(MonoBehaviour, Func<Boolean>, Action, Single)
items.summary: Repeats an action at a set interval until a condition is met.

syntax.content: public static Coroutine RepeatUntil(this MonoBehaviour behaviour, Func<bool> condition, Action action, float interval)

parameters.description: The condition to check.
The action to execute.
The interval to repeat the action, in seconds.

return.description: The coroutine.

items.name: ObjectExtensions
items.summary: Extension methods for Unity objects.

Finds a reference to the specified object type in the scene, and
assigns the reference to the object if it exists.

    where T : Object

parameters.description: The object to find the reference for.

typeParameters.description: The type of object to find.

items.name: ReadOnlyAttribute
items.summary:
An attribute that prevents a field from being changed in the editor,
i.e., it is read-only.

items.summary: An attribute that renames a field in the editor.

items.summary: The new name of the field.

items.name: TargetFrameRate
items.summary: Sets the target frame rate of the application.

items.summary: The target frame rate of the application.

items.name: TimedObject.TimeoutEvent
items.summary: A type of event that occurs when the object is timed out.

items.name: Destroy
items.summary: Destroys the object when timed out.

items.name: Deactivate
items.summary: Deactivates the object when timed out.

items.name: Disable
items.summary: Disables a behaviour on the object when timed out.

items.name: TimedObject
items.summary: Destroys or deactives an object after a specified amount of time.

items.name: timeout
items.summary: The amount of time in seconds before the object is timed out.

items.name: timeoutEvent
items.summary: The event that occurs when the object is timed out.

items.name: timeoutBehavior
items.summary:
The behaviour to disable when timed out (only applicable for
TimeoutEvent.Disable).

items.name: detachChildren
items.summary:
Detaches the children of the object before it is destroyed (only
applicable for TimeoutEvent.Destroy).

items.name: Timeout()
items.summary: Handles the object being timed out.

items.name: Yield
items.summary: Caches yield statements to minimize garbage collection.

items.name: initialCapacity
items.summary: The initial capacity of the yield cache.

items.name: endOfFrame
items.summary:
Waits until the end of the frame, just before displaying the frame
on screen.

items.name: fixedUpdate
items.summary: Waits until the next fixed frame rate update function.

items.name: Wait(Single)
items.summary:
Suspends the coroutine execution for the given amount of seconds
using scaled time.

parameters.description: The number of seconds to wait.

return.description: The yield statement.

items.name: WaitRealtime(Single)
items.summary:
Suspends the coroutine execution for the given amount of seconds
using unscaled time.

parameters.description: The number of seconds to wait.

return.description: The yield statement.

items.name: WaitUntil(Func<Boolean>, Int32)
items.summary:
Suspends the coroutine execution until the supplied delegate
evaluates to true.

syntax.content: public static WaitUntil WaitUntil(Func<bool> predicate, int id)

parameters.description: The delegate to evaluate.
The id to cache the yield statement with.

return.description: The yield statement.

items.name: WaitWhile(Func<Boolean>, Int32)
items.summary:
Suspends the coroutine execution until the supplied delegate
evaluates to false.

syntax.content: public static WaitWhile WaitWhile(Func<bool> predicate, int id)

parameters.description: The delegate to evaluate.
The id to cache the yield statement with.

return.description: The yield statement.
